= Visualization =
The visualization is one of the most important and complex features of the ODR. As a result a fair amount of time has been spent on its documentation. On this page you can find several diagrams that may be useful when investigating the visualization.

If you are unfamiliar with the visualization you should first take a look on the requirements ([http://code.google.com/p/opendecisionrepository/wiki/spuc_17 UC-17] and [http://code.google.com/p/opendecisionrepository/wiki/spuc_23 UC-23]) and the [http://code.google.com/p/opendecisionrepository/wiki/Preview_relationship_view preview video].
